text: Pros HCL Technologies - Americas is a large, decentralized organization with hundreds of large and small IT Services contracts in commercial and defense companies. So, (not if but..) when you have issues with your basic SW/HW tools, travel expenses, or benefits, you will either suffer through a bureaucratic maze of approvals, referrals, and waiting...or give up and live with broken/unresolved issue.
